item.title: Xtend
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Ask more, get more, and do more with the smartest smartwatch in town - the all-new boAt Xtend. Leave your phone in your pocket and get your tasks done with a built-in Alexa. Take control over your music, fitness, and more with a 1.69" (4.29 Cms) complete capacitive LCD display. Your wellness is now on your wrist with its Guided Meditative Breathing, Stress Monitor, and Sleep SpO2 Monitoring. Its 50 watch faces let you don a unique style every day. Make more out of your days with boAt Xtend.
item.content:encoded: Ask more, get more, and do more with the smartest smartwatch in town – the all-new boAt Xtend. Leave your phone in your pocket and get your tasks done with a built-in Alexa. Take control over your music, fitness, and more with a 1.69″ (4.29 Cms) complete capacitive LCD display. Your wellness is now on your wrist with its Guided Meditative Breathing, Stress Monitor, and Sleep SpO2 Monitoring. Its 50 watch faces let you don a unique style every day. Make more out of your days with boAt Xtend.

item.title: Flash
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Dear boAtheads, we bring to you Watch Flash that isn’t here to make you squint your eyes but widen them with awe and wonder even more! With a 33mm LCD Display and a perfectly round dial boAt Flash smartwatch is what you will be flaunting in style. It is slim, sleak, eye-catching with a metallic finish and comes in dual colors. Oh! The uniqueness is just how you like it. What more? boAt Flash smart watch will be monitoring your heart rate and blood oxygen SpO2 24*7 So do that intense workout and sleep without a worry too! 10 active sports mode and activity tracker will only make your life easier and the six watch faces will dwell with your mood and keep you sassed. With live weather forecast, 7 day long battery, music and camera control, IP68, get ready to be fit in a flash and love it!

With live weather forecast, 7 day long battery, music and camera control, IP68, get ready to be fit in a flash and love it!

item.title: Xtend Call Plus
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Xtend your limits with the largest display in Xtend series yet. With a 1.91” HD display and 90% screen to body ratio, boAt Xtend Call Plus takes display clarity to the next level. Accurate insights with 100+ sports modes, heart rate and blood oxygen monitor helps you in being on top of your health at all times. To extend all that you can do the with a smartwatch, it also has single-chip bluetooth and AI noise cancellation that allows you to connect with your loved ones seamlessly with crystal clarity by subdueing background sound during calls. Wrap it on your wrist and xtend what you can do with a smartwatch. Read more at: https://www.boat-lifestyle.com/products/xtend-call-plus-largest-display-smartwatch?variant=40340131414114
item.content:encoded:
Xtend your limits with the largest display in Xtend series yet. With a 1.91” HD display and 90% screen to body ratio, boAt Xtend Call Plus takes display clarity to the next level. Accurate insights with 100+ sports modes, heart rate and blood oxygen monitor helps you in being on top of your health at all times. To extend all that you can do the with a smartwatch, it also has single-chip bluetooth and AI noise cancellation that allows you to connect with your loved ones seamlessly with crystal clarity by subdueing background sound during calls. Wrap it on your wrist and xtend what you can do with a smartwatch.

Read more at: https://www.boat-lifestyle.com/products/xtend-call-plus-largest-display-smartwatch?variant=40340131414114

item.title: Storm Pro Call
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Let your smartwatch do the talking with boAt Storm Pro Call. With a 4.52 cm AMOLED 60hz display, experience smooth and swift graphics that’ll help you keep in touch with your loved ones when Bluetooth calling directly from your smartwatch. Combining the best of both worlds, Storm Pro comes with the best-in-class health features including 700+ active modes, heart rate tracker, SPO2 tracker and a lot more! Smart got smarter with Storm Pro Call, there’s nothing that it can’t do. Smart notifications, weather updates, call, text, quick reply, quick camera control, all just a swipe away.
item.content:encoded: Let your smartwatch do the talking with boAt Storm Pro Call. With a 4.52 cm AMOLED 60hz display, experience smooth and swift graphics that’ll help you keep in touch with your loved ones when Bluetooth calling directly from your smartwatch. Combining the best of both worlds, Storm Pro comes with the best-in-class health features including 700+ active modes, heart rate tracker, SPO2 tracker and a lot more! Smart got smarter with Storm Pro Call, there’s nothing that it can’t do. Smart notifications, weather updates, call, text, quick reply, quick camera control, all just a swipe away.

item.title: Lunar Connect
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: boAt Signature Audio ENx™ Technology is now in boAt Smartwatches. This enables you to have clear calls right from your wrist. The ENx™ Algorithm learns the difference between the human voice and any background sound and then uses that information to suppress the noise in background.
item.content:encoded: boAt Signature Audio ENx Technology is now in boAt Smartwatches. This enables you to have clear calls right from your wrist. The ENx Algorithm learns the difference between the human voice and any background sound and then uses that information to suppress the noise in background.

item.title: Wave Arcade
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Get your game on with Wave Arcade. This smartwatch features smart & seamless Bluetooth calling with a built-in speaker and mic. Now save up to 50 contacts right on your wrist. Manage your world on its big 4.59 cm HD Display smoothly. Guess what? It also comes with games to keep the boredom away!
item.content:encoded: Get your game on with Wave Arcade. This smartwatch features smart & seamless Bluetooth calling with a built-in speaker and mic. Now save up to 50 contacts right on your wrist. Manage your world on its big 4.59 cm HD Display smoothly. Guess what? It also comes with games to keep the boredom away!

item.title: Storm
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: The boAt Watch Storm is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation. Your Watch Storm is here to remove all obstructions that you may face in your fitness journey. With its daily activity tracker and 9 different sports modes, it will now be fun to track your journey towards health. Stay alert at all times with smart notifications from your phone with vibration alerts for calls, texts, schedule reminders, alarms, & more! The “wellness mode” of the smartwatch monitors your sleep, heart rate, blood oxygen levels as well as guides you into a meditative state when you need to relax. It also comes with a menstruation cycle tracker that predicts your cycle and health. Its “find my phone” feature will call your phone to easily locate it. The 5 ATM water resistance will keep the watch safe from splashes & sweat too!
item.content:encoded: The boAt Watch Storm is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation. Your Watch Storm is here to remove all obstructions that you may face in your fitness journey. With its daily activity tracker and 9 different sports modes, it will now be fun to track your journey towards health. Stay alert at all times with smart notifications from your phone with vibration alerts for calls, texts, schedule reminders, alarms, & more! The “wellness mode” of the smartwatch monitors your sleep, heart rate, blood oxygen levels as well as guides you into a meditative state when you need to relax. It also comes with a menstruation cycle tracker that predicts your cycle and health. Its “find my phone” feature will call your phone to easily locate it. The 5 ATM water resistance will keep the watch safe from splashes & sweat too!

item.title: Wave Electra
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Thrilling and electrifying. Wave Electra is here with a 1.81” HD display and Bluetooth calling on-the-go. Keep up with your health with 100+ sports modes that accurately track your activity and keeps you in a tip-top shape. If you’re bored, start gaming directly from your smartwatch with whack-a-mole and 2048 built-in. Wave Electra smartwatch supports IP68 Dust and Water Resistance and a massive 7 days of battery life for you to be unstoppable in achieving your fitness goals.
item.content:encoded: Thrilling and electrifying. Wave Electra is here with a 1.81” HD display and Bluetooth calling on-the-go. Keep up with your health with 100+ sports modes that accurately track your activity and keeps you in a tip-top shape. If you’re bored, start gaming directly from your smartwatch with whack-a-mole and 2048 built-in. Wave Electra smartwatch supports IP68 Dust and Water Resistance and a massive 7 days of battery life for you to be unstoppable in achieving your fitness goals.
